title: How to Make a Blue Summer Mocktail

steps.headline: Fill the glass halfway with ice cubes.
Add two lime wedges placing them inside the glass at the sides.
Sprinkle a few fresh blueberries over the ice.
Add a bit more ice cubes.
Top with a few more blueberries.
Add a few more wedges of lime.
Add a squeeze of lime juice.
Pour in 4 to 5 ounces ginger beer.

text: Fill the glass halfway with ice cubes.  Add two lime wedges placing them inside the glass at the sides.  Sprinkle a few fresh blueberries over the ice.  Add a bit more ice cubes.  Top with a few more blueberries.  Add a few more wedges of lime.  Add a squeeze of lime juice.  Pour in 4 to 5 ounces ginger beer.  Finished.
